statistics.name: acquired_djump
statistics.description: Set whenever the double jump ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_glide
statistics.description: Set whenever the glide ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_health1
statistics.description: Set whenever the first health increase ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_health2
statistics.description: Set whenever the second health increase ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_health3
statistics.description: Set whenever the third health increase ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_health4
statistics.description: Set whenever the fourth health increase ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_run
statistics.description: Set whenever the run ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_shoot
statistics.description: Set whenever the shoot ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: acquired_shoot2
statistics.description: Set whenever the powered up shoot ability has been acquired ingame.

statistics.name: completed_best_time
statistics.description: Best time for beating the game!  (Either easy or hard ending.)  Note that this is in SECONDS.

statistics.name: completed_game
statistics.description: This is set when the game is completed.

statistics.name: completed_game_hard
statistics.description: This is set when the game has been beaten with the most difficult ending.  (Internally, requires songs_collected >=4 and that the player has activated the good ending.)

statistics.name: enemies_killed
statistics.description: Probably not useful, but here you go. :)

statistics.name: final_boss_killed
statistics.description: Set whenever the game's final boss has been killed by the player.

statistics.name: memories_collected
statistics.description: The total number of memories that a player has collected per game.  (Resets if a new game is started.)

statistics.name: sinistar_boss_killed
statistics.description: Set whenever the mid-game boss (aka "Sinistar boss") has been killed by the player.

statistics.name: songs_collected
statistics.description: The total number of songs (aka secrets) that a player has collected per game.  (Resets if a new game is started.)

statistics.name: trophy_10memory
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 10 memories.  Early-mid game.

statistics.name: trophy_20memory
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 20 memories.  Mid game.

statistics.name: trophy_2gem
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 2 gems (aka songs, aka secrets)  This trophy is likely only acquired once the player really explores the game.

statistics.name: trophy_30memory
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 30 memories.  There are 31 memories in the game, so this will only be acquired whenever the player has explored most of the game.

statistics.name: trophy_4gem
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 4 gems (aka songs, aka secrets)  This trophy is likely only acquired once the player really explores the game.  All 4 gems are required to unlock the hard ending (songs_collected will =4)

statistics.name: trophy_5memory
statistics.description: Trophy acquired whenever player collects 5 memories.  Usually very early in the game.

statistics.name: trophy_6health
statistics.description: Given to the player when they have all 6 hitpoints.  (After acquiring all 4 health powerups, see acquire_healthX)

statistics.name: trophy_beat
statistics.description: Acquired when the player has beaten the game on any difficulty.

statistics.name: trophy_boss
statistics.description: Acquired when the player beats the final game boss.

statistics.name: trophy_bounce
statistics.description: A secret trophy.  Player must bounce on an enemy using the run ability for 10 times.

statistics.name: trophy_button
statistics.description: Given whenever the player learns how to interact with in-game buttons (for opening doors or whatnot).  The very first trophy that the player receives (as an early reward/teaching about trophies deal).

statistics.name: trophy_deal
statistics.description: Secret trophy.  Acquired when the player tricks an enemy into dying in a bottomless pit/lava pit.

statistics.name: trophy_goodending
statistics.description: Acquired when the player has beaten the game AND received the good ending.  (See completed_game_hard)

statistics.name: trophy_masochist
statistics.description: Acquired when the player beats the game with the default 3 bars of health.

statistics.name: trophy_sinistar
statistics.description: Acquired when the player beats the mid-game boss (aka Sinistar).

statistics.name: trophy_time50
statistics.description: Received when the player beats the game within 50 minutes.

statistics.name: trophy_tophat
statistics.description: Secret trophy.  Given when they find the game's obscure Amiga computer reference. :)
